name: Charizard
flavorText:
Spits fire that
is hot enough to
melt boulders. Known to cause
forest fires
unintentionally.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.flavorText:
Obviously prefers
hot places. When
it rains, steam is said to spout
from the tip of
its tail.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.flavorText:
When it swings
its burning tail,
it elevates the temperature to
unbearably high
levels.
